cookieConsent.title: Cookie Settings
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to provide you with the best experience on our website. Some are necessary, others help us improve the website.
cookieConsent.functionalDesc: Improve user experience and enable personalized content.
cookieConsent.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how visitors interact with the website (anonymized).
cookieConsent.marketingDesc: Enable personalized advertising and tracking across multiple websites.
cookieConsent.necessaryDesc: These cookies are required for basic website functionality and cannot be disabled.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.acceptanceText: I have read and agree to the Terms and Conditions.

scope.title: Scope of Application
scope.content: These Terms and Conditions apply to all contracts for the delivery of goods concluded between a consumer or entrepreneur and us as the seller.
scope.variations: Deviating conditions of the customer are only recognized if we have expressly agreed to them in writing.

contract.title: Contract Formation
contract.offer: The presentation of products in the online shop does not constitute a legally binding contractual offer on our part.
contract.order: By submitting an order, you make a binding offer to purchase the goods contained in the shopping cart.
contract.acceptance: The purchase contract is concluded when we accept your order by order confirmation email or ship the goods.

payment.title: Prices and Payment
payment.prices: All prices are inclusive of statutory VAT and other price components.
payment.methods: Payment is made by advance payment, credit card or PayPal.
payment.due: For advance payment, the purchase price is due immediately after conclusion of the contract.

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.time: Delivery takes place within 7-14 working days after receipt of payment.
delivery.area: We deliver exclusively within the European Union.
delivery.costs: Shipping costs are displayed during the ordering process and are borne by the customer.

withdrawal.title: Right of Withdrawal
withdrawal.right: You have the right to withdraw from this contract within fourteen days without giving any reason.
withdrawal.period: The withdrawal period is fourteen days from the day on which you or a third party designated by you took possession of the goods.
withdrawal.contact: To exercise your right of withdrawal, you must inform us by means of a clear statement of your decision.

warranty.title: Warranty
warranty.defects: Defects must be reported to us immediately in writing.

privacy.title: Data Protection
privacy.processing: Your personal data will be processed in accordance with our privacy policy.
privacy.consent: By placing an order, you consent to data processing for the stated purposes.

law.title: Applicable Law
law.content: The law of the Federal Republic of Germany applies to all legal relationships between us and the customer.

dataController.title: Data Controller
dataController.content:
Responsible for data processing on this website:

Sample Street 123
12345 Berlin

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We only collect personal data if you voluntarily provide it to us or if this is necessary to fulfill the contractual purpose.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: This website uses cookies. For more information, please see our cookie settings.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to information, correction, deletion, restriction of processing, objection and data portability.
